data.persona: I am an animal that can wonder or be kept in a dwelling. I like to play with mice. I can be mean or I can be friendly.
data.description:
You are in the Loading Dock.
The loading dock is filled with life and movement. Many trucks back up into the
There's a cargo and a pirate here.
The merchant and the mariner are here.

You are carrying nothing.
